description: HTML file defining Polymer web components for a TodoMVC application, including templates, styles, and component definitions.

methods.name: addTodoAction
methods.description: Adds a new todo item based on user input.

methods.name: cancelAddTodoAction
methods.description: Cancels the addition of a new todo item.

methods.name: toggleAllCompletedAction
methods.description: Marks all todos as completed or active.

methods.name: matchesFilter
methods.description: Filters todo items based on current route.

methods.name: _computeLinkClass
methods.description: Computes CSS class for filter links based on route.

methods.name: _computeItemsLeft
methods.description: Calculates number of remaining active items.

methods.name: _editAction
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a todo item.

methods.name: _commitAction
methods.description: Commits changes to a todo item.

methods.name: _cancelAction
methods.description: Cancels editing mode for a todo item.

methods.name: _onBlur
methods.description: Handles blur event on input fields.
